name: Colony Conflict
description:
Colony Conflict is a round based competitive city builder with focus on resource management. 

You and your opponent are given control of opposite sides of an island. Try to out-colonize your opponent by becoming the more successful colony!

Colony Conflict Community Discord

Wiki

You can build buildings on tiles you own (marked by a flag in your color).

You can claim tiles adjacent to a tile you own.

Your objective is to out-colonize your opponent.

Build resource production buildings, supply your colony with it's life needs, and push your land rapidly to claim the most points!
